medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has continued to have poor oral intake at home, remained bed bound, and started experiencing emesis yesterday along with abdominal pain. He has not had a bowel movement in the past several days until he was disimpacted in the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Traumatic brain injury complicated by right upper and right lower extremity contractures and limited verbal ability several years ago, hypertension, osteoarthritis, coronary artery disease, dysphagia, constipation, and anorexia.
medical_history.social_history: The patient smoked 1 pack per day since the age of unspecified and has not smoked since relocating. He drank one bottle of rum daily from his teens until unspecified, after which he drank unspecified beers daily. He was bed bound since hospitalization and lived with his sister after moving due to lack of electricity and running water.
